item.title: 中国住房救助在试点城市的记录不佳
item.description: 中国的大型住房救援行动旨在加强已在进行的小规模努力--这些努力正在努力获得牵引力。【原文：China’s big housing rescue aims to build on smaller efforts that are already under way – and struggling to get traction.】

item.title: 法国警告：中国工业威胁整个全球经济
item.description: 法国财政部长布鲁诺-勒梅尔（Bruno Le Maire）在七国集团的联合批评声中表示，中国廉价出口产品过剩将危及整个世界经济。【原文：The entire world economy is at risk from a glut of cheap Chinese exports, France’s Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire said in tandem with a barrage of joint criticism from the Group of Seven.】

item.title: 澳元多头在通往大流行性高点的漫长道路上面临失望
item.description: 随着对中国经济反弹的乐观情绪消退，以及当地经济的衰退，希望澳元走强超过密切跟踪水平的交易商们注定要失望了。【原文：Traders hoping the Australian dollar will strengthen beyond a closely tracked level are set to be disappointed as optimism over China’s rebound fades and the local economy falters.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老基金关注利基私人债务以提高回报率
item.description: 澳大利亚的养老金巨头们正在寻求将其私人信贷风险扩大到一些新兴产品上，因为现金充裕的养老金行业正在想方设法使投资组合多样化并提高收益。【原文：Australia’s pension giants are looking to expand their private credit exposure to some nascent products, as the cash-flushed industry hunts for ways to diversify portfolios and boost returns.】

item.title: 习近平的中国电动车梦想成真。10 年过去了，围墙正在拔地而起
item.description: 就在十年前的今天，习近平主席在视察中国最大的汽车制造商之一上汽集团的几款豪华轿车时，发表了一篇至关重要的讲话，使中国走上了主导电动汽车行业的道路。【原文：Ten years ago almost to the day, while checking out a handful of luxury sedans from one of China’s largest automakers SAIC Motor Corp., President Xi Jinping gave a pivotal speech that would set China on the course to dominate the electric vehicle industry.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 从可可到锌，大宗商品的反弹幅度是两年来最大的。随着周一阵亡将士纪念日假期的到来，美国烧烤季正式拉开帷幕，牛肉和猪肉正显示出需求改善的良好迹象。与此同时，欧佩克+审查石油产量限制的政策会议定于6月2日举行，此时正值大西洋飓风季节开始前后；在此期间，风暴可能会威胁到美国的原油生产。【原文：From cocoa to zinc, the breadth of the commodities rally is the biggest in two years. Beef and pork are showing promising signs of improving demand as barbecue season officially kicks off in the US with Monday’s Memorial Day holiday. Meanwhile, OPEC+’s policy meeting to review oil output curbs is set for June 2, around the start of the Atlantic hurricane season — a period when storms can threaten US crude production.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，比尔-格罗斯预计特朗普胜选将扰乱债券市场
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，比尔-格罗斯表示，唐纳德-特朗普在美国总统大选中获胜对债券市场的破坏性要大于乔-拜登获胜。【原文：Bill Gross said that a Donald Trump victory in the US presidential election would be more disruptive for bond markets than a Joe Biden win, according to the Financial Times.】

item.title: 英国工党承诺重新考虑出售 NatWest 银行股份的计划
item.description: 工党承诺，如果在即将举行的大选中获胜，将重新考虑削减英国政府在 NatWest Group Plc 股份的计划。【原文：The Labour Party pledged to review plans to cut the UK government’s stake in NatWest Group Plc if it wins the upcoming general election.】

item.title: 陷入美联储等待游戏的债券交易员迎来好消息
item.description: 因美联储利率政策而陷入观望的债券交易员很快就会得到一些可喜的支持。【原文：Bond traders who are stuck in a waiting game over Federal Reserve rate policy will soon get some welcome support.】

item.title: 据说运动鞋制造商金鹅即将在米兰启动首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，奢侈运动鞋品牌 Golden Goose SpA 计划最快于本周在米兰启动首次公开募股，从而延续今年欧洲上市的强劲反弹势头。【原文：Luxury sneaker brand Golden Goose SpA plans to kick off an initial public offering in Milan as soon as this week, according to people familiar with the matter, extending a strong rebound in European listings this year.】

item.title: 恒大电动车部门称其清算人已找到潜在买家
item.description: 陷入困境的房地产开发商中国恒大集团旗下的电动汽车部门表示，清算人正在与潜在买家进行谈判，该买家还可能提供新的信贷额度以支持生产。【原文：The EV unit of embattled real estate developer China Evergrande Group said liquidators are in talks with a potential buyer who may also extend a new line of credit to support production.】

item.title: 在老龄化世界中，印度和印度尼西亚在新兴市场投资者中脱颖而出
item.description: 富达国际（Fidelity International）和贝莱德投资研究所（BlackRock Investment Institute）指出，印度和印度尼西亚等新兴市场的人口正以稳健的速度增长，随着人口结构开始在投资决策中发挥更大的作用，这些市场将从中受益。【原文：Emerging markets such as India and Indonesia, whose populations are growing at a solid pace, stand to benefit as demographics begin to play a bigger role in investment decisions, according to Fidelity International and BlackRock Investment Institute.】

item.title: 肖尔茨称资本市场联盟是马克龙会晤的优先事项
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）表示，在本周与法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）的会晤中，建立欧洲资本市场联盟将是一个优先事项。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said the creation of a European capital markets union will be a priority during meetings with French President Emmanuel Macron this week.】

item.title: 随着 "雷马尔 "气旋的逼近，印度海军准备开展救援工作
item.description: 根据一份官方声明，随着气旋接近西孟加拉邦，印度海军已开始准备救灾。【原文：India’s navy has started preparing for disaster relief as a cyclone nears West Bengal, according to an official statement.】

item.title: 飓风来袭，印度加尔各答机场将暂停飞行
item.description: 新德里（美联社）— 印度加尔各答机场当局表示，孟加拉湾上空的风暴增强为强气旋风暴后，印度加尔各答机场将从周日午夜起暂停航班运营 21 小时。【原文：NEW DELHI (AP) — India’s Kolkata airport will suspend flight operations from midnight Sunday for 21 hours after a storm over the Bay of Bengal intensified into a severe cyclonic storm, airport authorities said.】

item.title: 环球时报》称中国企业寻求对欧盟猪肉进行倾销调查
item.description: 国营媒体《环球时报》援引一位 "商业内幕人士 "的消息称，中国企业计划要求有关部门对从欧盟进口的猪肉展开反倾销调查。【原文：Chinese industries plan to ask authorities to start an anti-dumping investigation into pork imports from the European Union, the state-run Global Times said, citing information from a “business insider.”】

item.title: 特朗普誓言在加密货币上诉中援助被定罪的 "丝绸之路 "创始人
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）呼吁为 "丝绸之路"（Silk Road）网络市场的创始人罗斯-乌尔布里赫特（Ross Ulbricht）减刑，试图将自己定位为自由党选民心目中支持加密货币的候选人。【原文：Donald Trump called to commute the sentence of Ross Ulbricht, the founder of the Silk Road online marketplace, in an attempt to position himself as a pro-cryptocurrency candidate to Libertarian voters.】

item.title: 莫迪的民意调查目标成疑，印度市场准备迎接大跌
item.description: 如果印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的政党在民意调查中赢得较少的多数票，那么印度蓬勃发展的市场将面临下挫的风险，这将危及他更广泛的改革计划。【原文：India’s booming markets are at risk of a selloff should Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party win a slimmer majority in the polls, which would endanger his plans for more extensive reforms.】

item.title: 债务压力增大，法国将削减失业救济金
item.description: 法国总理加布里埃尔-阿塔尔（Gabriel Attal）公布了一项削减法国失业救济金的计划，以推进埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的经济改革。【原文：Prime Minister Gabriel Attal unveiled a plan to cut French unemployment benefits in a bid to advance President Emmanuel Macron’s economic reforms.】

item.title: 美联储最青睐的基本通胀指标被认为正在降温
item.description: 美联储的一线通胀指标即将显示，顽固的物价压力将略有缓解，这也印证了央行行长们对降息时机的审慎态度。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s first-line inflation gauge is about to show some modest relief from stubborn price pressures, corroborating central bankers’ prudence about the timing of interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: Glass Lewis 称，特斯拉股东应拒绝马斯克的薪酬
item.description: 一家大型代理咨询公司敦促特斯拉公司股东否决为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）提议的 560 亿美元薪酬方案，这对这家电动汽车制造商的董事会是一个打击。【原文：Tesla Inc. shareholders are being urged by a major proxy advisory firm to reject a proposed $56 billion pay package for Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk, in a blow to the electric-vehicle maker’s board.】

item.title: 对高风险 CLO 的押注正以 20% 的收益得到回报：信贷周刊
item.description: 随着贷款业绩的改善、债务利差的收窄和偿付能力的增长，抵押贷款债务中风险最高的部分的回报率也在飙升，大西洋两岸的年化回报率都达到了 20% 左右。【原文：Returns on the riskiest portion of collateralized loan obligations are booming, reaching about 20% annualized on both sides of the Atlantic as loan performance improves, debt spreads tighten and payouts grow.】

item.title: 英国石油公司南部非洲分公司和壳牌下游公司将出售炼油厂资产
item.description: 英国石油南非有限公司（BP Southern Africa (Pty) Ltd.）和壳牌南非下游有限公司（Shell Downstream South Africa (Pty) Ltd.）达成协议，将各自持有的南非最大炼油厂资产的 50%股份出售给国有的中央能源基金有限公司（Central Energy Fund SOC Ltd.）。【原文：BP Southern Africa (Pty) Ltd. and Shell Downstream South Africa (Pty) Ltd. have reached an agreement to sell their respective 50% stakes in assets held by the nation’s largest refinery to state-owned Central Energy Fund SOC Ltd.】

item.title: 上田暗示日本收益率创 12 年新高并非主要问题
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，他对长期债券收益率升至2012年以来的最高水平并无大碍，并称长期债券收益率应由市场引导。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda indicated that he has no major problem with long-term bond yields rising to the highest level since 2012, saying they should be guided by markets.】

item.title: 七国集团团结一致抨击中国 威胁贸易升级
item.description: 中国在全球商业体系中的参与受到了七国集团财政部长们的严厉批评，在显示团结的同时还威胁要进一步升级。【原文：China’s engagement in the global system of commerce was roundly criticized by Group of Seven finance chiefs in a show of unity accompanied by a threat of further escalation.】

item.title: 龙卷风毁坏房屋，得克萨斯州和俄克拉荷马州居民寻求避难所
item.description: 俄克拉荷马市（美联社）— 星期六晚上，一场龙卷风在得克萨斯州触地并穿过州际公路，造成了破坏和可能的人员伤亡，因为分散的强风暴在得克萨斯州和俄克拉荷马州移动。【原文：OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) — A tornado touched down and crossed an interstate in Texas, causing damage and possible injuries as scattered severe storms moved through Texas and Oklahoma Saturday night.】

item.title: 乌克兰财政部长对七国集团资产计划进展表示满意
item.description: 乌克兰财政部长谢尔盖-马尔琴科（Serhiy Marchenko）表示，他对七国集团就通过从俄罗斯资产中攫取利润为援助提供资金的谈判所取得的进展感到高兴。【原文：Ukrainian Finance Minister Serhiy Marchenko said he’s pleased with how Group of Seven talks have advanced on funding aid via profits gleaned from Russian assets.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉就巨额金属储藏与铝业公牛对峙
item.description: 铝市场陷入了一些最大的贸易商和银行之间的冲突，超过 10 亿美元的金属易手，而伦敦金属交易所的仓库却排起了长队。【原文：The aluminum market is caught in a clash between some of the biggest traders and banks, with more than $1 billion of metal changing hands while lengthy queues form at London Metal Exchange warehouses.】

item.title: 克鲁格曼称对利率充满信心的投资者是在 "自欺欺人
item.description:
更高更长久？诺贝尔奖得主对未来之路深感迷茫 

【原文：

Higher for longer? A Nobel laureate is deeply uncertain about the path forward

】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔认为 6 月降息条件成熟
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，下月降息的时机已经成熟。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said the time is right for an interest-rate cut next month.】
